title: Balsamic braised red cabbage
time: Prep time 15 min, cooking time 3 hours
description: The magic of this braised red cabbage recipe is all in the wait. Cook low and slow for three hours until tender, succulent and gorgeously sweet.
ingredients: 450g Bramley apples, peeled, cored and sliced
Small handful fresh flatleaf parsley, chopped, to serve

method.Step 1: Cut the cabbage in half and cut out the core. Thinly slice the cabbage and put into a large casserole with a tight-fitting lid.

method.Step 2: Add the onions, apples, raisins, vinegar, sugar, butter and mixed spice, season well and mix together. Place over a low heat, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, for 3 hours, until tender and wilted down. Scatter with the parsley to serve.
